website_summaries.verdict: The DJI Phantom 3 Advanced is one of the best drones on the market thanks to a bevy of features and 2.7K video recording.
pros: Smooth video capture, even when in motion
cons: Wide-angle lens shows some edge distortion

website_summaries.verdict: The DJI Phantom 3 Standard is aimed at drone flyers on a budget, but our pre-production test unit was hampered by a short operating distance.
cons: Wide-angle lens shows some edge distortion
Battery requires more than an hour to recharge

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant bit of kit!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant bit of kit! I bought this for my son and he loves it. Well built, fantastic video quality and great fun to fly. I would recommend downloading the DJI Phantom simulator app so you can practise before you take it for it's first flight. I also bought a hard shelled back pack for this which is an absolute must, and don't forget a spare battery for maximum flying time. I would highly recommend this product, it really did exceed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lemonsquash

customer_reviews.title: Quality Drone.
customer_reviews.text: This is a Quality Drone, Controls work well, But the Holder for the Phone, is a Little flimsy and lightweight. Camera Work well, With a Excellent Picture, With a live video feed gives you 720P HD real-time view, Also takes 12MP photos. App is easy to download, And work well. I have Bought some Guards for the Propellers, They fitted easily, Also an extra Larger Battery for that extended flight Time. The Battery supplied did Last 20 mins or so. Overall a Quality Drone, But does take Practice, and Time to fly.
customer_reviews.author: joy

customer_reviews.title: I was like a child with a new toy
customer_reviews.text: A top class service and my lovely Drone arrived as promised, I was like a child with a new toy, the guy who was delivering it could not understand my enthusiasm lol. It is everything I expected and more. I had my first flight last night and plan to take her out for a good run on Thursday. I’m an X military man and I have some experience with drones but that was a different world. The phamtom 3 is top class, I highly recommend guards for your propellers and extended landing feet.
customer_reviews.author: Paulgobyrne

customer_reviews.title: Great Drone
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for present takes a while to learn to operate it otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Most fun I've had with my clothes on !!
customer_reviews.text: This drone is awesome, well worth the money, and loads of potential. Probably the best buy this year.
customer_reviews.author: shetland shuffler

customer_reviews.title: the propellers are breaking very easily. It does not cost that much to replace
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves it. Must warn you though, the propellers are breaking very easily. It does not cost that much to replace, so I do not mind that much
customer_reviews.author: dimitre nizamov

customer_reviews.title: Flying Phantom Fun ;)
customer_reviews.text: Truely a fantastic looking flying machine ...I love it 100% for the machine and 100% to the seller well done guys thanks kind regards mark ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mark  R Slater

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Only downside it comes with an Australian ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Only downside it comes with an Australian plug and no adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davis

customer_reviews.title: Exellent !
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product, highly recommend for a beginner just starting flying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery DEAD
customer_reviews.text: Nice drone , but after 3 months the battery died. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time drone user and I am so so happy with the Phantom 3. It is almost fool proof when flying (seriously, it would be really hard to crash it). I have an iPhone 7 to fly it with and I was concerned when reading the app reviews as upon writing this review the app had 1*. The app is perfect to be honest, I've had no issues so far with it. This is a perfect drone with all the good features (auto take off, follow me, return home etc...). I would definitely recommend buying an extra battery. 1 battery = 20-25mins flight dependent on how rigerously you fly it. Camera quality is brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing drone. The video quality, the control of the drone is perfect. It's quite easy to control it, it just takes more time to be a pro and do a lot of good videos shots. However, it's very handy. I'm only using it for my travel videos and it's more than enough. I'm pretty sure that for commercial video the quality in 2.7k can suit as well. I really recommend this product, this is so much fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ew one with a great camera then buy this period
customer_reviews.text: If you want s drone and you've never had one before. Or maybe you have had drones or quad filters before and you want a. Ew one with a great camera then buy this period. Awesome bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't include a uk plug, thankfully I had a spare fig8 cable lying around!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sands

customer_reviews.title: Great service !
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery, great price , Husband over the moon with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rich

customer_reviews.title: This is a great drone for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone for the price, image quality is great and is very easy to fly. The range isn't great so if you need long distance operation then consider maybe the advanced.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good drone. could have been better with more range.
customer_reviews.author: Petros Zografidis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing drone, highly recommended - watch for firmware issues though
customer_reviews.text: The gold standard for quadcopter drones. There are currently firmware issues with the Standard model that limit the range of the device far below manufacturing recommendations (google 'phantom 3 standard signal loss') so if you purchase this, be wary of updating the firmware. I would highly recommend this device - I've purchased many drones and the competition still does not even come close.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is not an 14mpx camera like they say in description. In fact is a 12mpx camera
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apart from the range, it is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I've rated it 4 stars as I'd give the PRO edition 5 stars. For me, the range is a little restrictive but there are mods out there that will extend your range considerably. This is the drone I use on my you tube channel called Not The Mature Approach (cos lets face it, we are big kids really). I've had it a lot further than standard and done many tests in different environments. In conclusion, it is a great bit of kit, I love my drone! Maybe watch a couple of my videos so you know what to expect before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: D Murray

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant drone.
customer_reviews.text: My first drone ever and I love it, absolutely brilliant. Really easy to fly for a beginner, busy what you need to get going. Camera is great and takes beautiful pictures also video is great too.. As for range I'd say it's just right for beginners, it goes far enough away and high up so you can still see it at all times. Once you get used to it and your ready to travel further afield then maybe think about an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Uppal

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING drone
customer_reviews.text: this is an AMAZING drone. The range is spectacular and the camera is really high quality!!!!!!!! It ia AMAZING for its price!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the first few flights then a defective motor ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the first few flights then a defective motor resulted in a crash - this is where all the problems started. DJI's after sales service is absolutely appalling, bordering on contempt for the customer. Go to the DJI Service Forum and read some of the stories. In my case they had the drone for two months. After around 50 emails and many hours on the phone they returned it to me still broken and actually in an even worse state than when I'd sent it (had maybe taken parts off it). Please investigate the stories of people's experience trying to get problems sorted before buying anything from DJI. Personally, I've reported them to Trading Standards.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: drone is great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: drone is great for beginners, but app only works if you have an iphone or ipad so bad investment if you're not prepared to pay even more than the drone costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
